application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 5080 Holm Oak - Evergreen Oak (Quercus ilex) Reduce defect limb to East at 6m above ground level by approx. 6m, to suitable growth point. 	5090 (lower tag) False Acacia (Robinia pseudoacacia) Crown clean by removal of weak and dead branches. Reduce low limb to east (with area of decay near union with main stem) by 5m.5347 Holm Oak - Evergreen Oak (Quercus ilex) Reduce low limb to south east (with cavity 2m from main stem) by 3m. Crown clean and remove deadwood. 		5339 Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) Crown Reduction by 40% - Reducing the height by 8m and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 7m and spread 6m.		5329 Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) Remove limb at 6m to south west (with split at base) 		5299 Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) Crown clean by removal of deadwood; 5285 Cherry (Prunus spp)	 Dead tree - monolith at 3m.  	5283 Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)	Crown clean by removal of deadwood
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
